name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: Caesar Clown's laboratory on Punk Hazard where he conducts experiments and produces SAD. The facility contains multiple buildings connected by passages.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs. Caesar Battle
keyEvents.description: Luffy confronts Caesar in his laboratory, beginning their fierce battle.
keyEvents.significance: The main battle location where Luffy attempts to capture Caesar for the alliance's plan.

keyEvents.title: Monet's Powers Revealed
keyEvents.description: Monet reveals her Yuki Yuki no Mi powers in the laboratory to protect Caesar.
keyEvents.significance: First demonstration of Monet's Devil Fruit abilities in this location.

statusHistory.reason: Laboratory is operational during Punk Hazard arc

description: The connecting passage between Buildings A and B of the Punk Hazard facility. During the facility's lockdown, these passages become deadly as poison gas floods through them.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs. Vergo
keyEvents.description: Sanji and Vergo battle in the passage as it begins to close and poison gas enters.
keyEvents.significance: The dangerous environment adds urgency to the battle as both fighters must escape the gas.

keyEvents.title: Poison Gas Flooding
keyEvents.description: The facility lockdown causes poison gas to flood into the passages, forcing Sanji and Vergo to flee.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a time limit for all characters on Punk Hazard to escape.

statusHistory.reason: Passage is functional but becoming dangerous due to gas

description: The room in Building D of Punk Hazard where SAD (the base material for artificial Devil Fruits called SMILEs) is produced. This is Caesar's most important facility and Law's primary target.

keyEvents.title: Law Infiltrates SAD Production
keyEvents.description: Trafalgar Law successfully infiltrates the SAD production room in Building D, triggering an emergency alert.
keyEvents.significance: This is Law's true objective - to destroy the SAD production and cripple Doflamingo's SMILE operations.

statusHistory.reason: Production facility active until Law destroys it
